Key Match Events: Youri Tielemans scored Belgium's opening goal after 73 seconds
Kevin De Bruyne scored Belgium's second goal after 80 minutes
Pre-Game Insights: Belgium made four changes from their opening game, including restoring Jan Vertonghen to defence and adding Youri Tielemans alongside Amadou Onana in midfield
Post-Match Reflections: Domenico Tedesco expressed relief at winning the game and expressed frustration at missing chances
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Cologne Stadium
Others: The match was the second for Belgium in Group E of Euro 2024, and it left the group all square
